channel.title: [562] How can i get to my characters folder? [562]
channel.description: I am new to all 508+ and i would like to know how i can get to my characters folder. i know this is sorta spoonfeeding but i am basically a clueless bastard. Also if possible, does anyone have a great tutorial or a link to a tutorial that basically tells all information or basic information on how to use a 508+ like a 562? like how to make yourself owner, how to add autospawn area's for npcs, how to add an object to an area like an altar, how to make an area multi-combat, and such. Thanks for anyone that helps! Flammers...fuck off, hit teh back button in your top left corner of web browser..

It’s in the data folder, I believe.

\data\savedgames is where mine are… Try doing just a slight bit of searching next time it’s not hard to find…
